email.created_account_in_organization_de: Hello {{username}}, an account has been created for you in {{orgName}} on Cella.
email.please_verify_email: Please verify your email for Cella
email.verification_text_1: Hi, you are almost ready to start on Cella! Click the link below to verify your email address and get started. The link expires in 2 hours.
email.invite_preview_text: You have been invited to join Cella
email.invite_in_organization_preview_tex: You have been invited to join {{orgName}} on Cella
email.invite_description: Hi {{username}}, you have been invited to Cella by {{invitedBy}}
email.invite_to_organization_description: Hi {{username}}, you have been invited to {{orgName}} on Cella by {{invitedBy}}
email.invite_title: You have been invited to join Cella
email.invite_reply_to: Reply to this email if you have any questions.
email.invite_expire: This link will expire in 7 days.
email.invite_to_organization_title: You have been invited to join {{orgName}}
email.reset_password_text_3: Ignore this email if you don't want to change your password or didn't request it.
email.reset_password_text_2: This link will expire in 3 hours. To get a new password reset link, visit:
email.reset_password_text_1: A password reset link has been requested for your Cella account. If this was you, you can set a new password here:
